text:
[Verse]
Wake up see the sun
New day just begun
Grab my shoes let's run
Life is full of fun

[Verse 2]
Feel the breeze so light
Sunshine shining bright
Everything’s alright
Day turns into night

[Chorus]
Dance under the skies
Smiles in our eyes
No more alibis
Let’s just improvise

[Verse 3]
City streets so loud
We stand out the crowd
Hearts beating so proud
Let's make love our vow

[Bridge]
Lost in this moment
Let’s make some new friends
Feelings never end
Happiness we send

[Chorus]
Dance under the skies
Smiles in our eyes
No more alibis
Let’s just improvise
title: Sunshine Skies
